name: integrally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in way that is necessary and important as a part of a whole: Pascal has been integrally involved in the whole process from start to finish. This question is integrally related to the previous one.
in a way that is contained within something and not separate from it: The filter has been built integrally into the machine. Two lights are integrally mounted on the control panel.
More examplesFewer examplesDr Webster has been integrally involved with the development of this new product.Her name is integrally linked with the cause of feminism.Her own destiny had become integrally intertwined with the destiny of her country.
